data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Samdrupjongkhar.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Samdrupjongkhar, Bhutan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Samdrupjongkhar words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.section_summary: On average, 4 will die without Jesus in the next month in Samdrupjongkhar, Bhutan.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Lord we pray you unite the 19 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Samdrupjongkhar.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Samdrupjongkhar, Bhutan a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Mahishya people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Mahishya people know you.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Samdrupjongkhar who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Samdrupjongkhar.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.section_summary:
the state of Samdrupjongkhar, Bhutan has a population of 9,400.

We estimate Samdrupjongkhar has 19 people who might know Jesus, 66 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 9,315 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 494 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Samdrupjongkhar access to a Bible in their own language.
